description: Mary at center, with thin halo, wearing olive-brown headscarf and rose-colored garment, hands raised, looking at infant Jesus in LRQ; nude baby Jesus with blonde curly hair seated on a white cushion, PR hand raised in blessing; St. Catherine at LLC, wearing jeweled hair ornaments and ring on right ring finger, leaning on top portion of her wheel, looking at Jesus; bearded Joseph at right with thin halo
marks: Signature and Date LRC on wheel, in rose pink: [LAVINIA FONTANA DE ZA
title: The Holy Family with Saint Catherine of Alexandria
